qas.question: Where does Oklahoma rank by land area?
How many square miles is Oklahoma?
How many square miles of water is in Oklahoma?
How many states are on the Frontier Strip?
Which state is north of Oklahoma?

context: Oklahoma is the <a0_0>20th<a0_0/> largest state in the United States, covering an area of <a1_0>69,898<a1_0/> square miles (181,035 km2), with 68,667 square miles (177847 km2) of land and <a2_0>1,281<a2_0/> square miles (3,188 km2) of water. It is one of <a3_0>six<a3_0/> states on the Frontier Strip and lies partly in the Great Plains near the geographical center of the 48 contiguous states. It is bounded on the east by Arkansas and Missouri, on the north by <a4_0>Kansas<a4_0/>, on the northwest by Colorado, on the far west by New Mexico, and on the south and near-west by Texas.
